resources.string: [Curvilinear movement] Hold your phone with the video and move your arms while keeping it as level as possible. It is recommended that the angle of the wrist be in line with the arm. Weak vibration occurs when exercising at an incorrect angle, and this action cannot be counted. Vibration occurs at count, and counts once round trip. The higher the step, the greater the angle of motion of the arm required for the count. Exercise records are recorded in the application when achieving the goal.
This is a rehabilitation helper application that helps you do rehabilitation exercises after removing the arm casts. Thank you for using us.

[Extraordinary Exercise] Hold your cell phone with the video and move your arms while keeping it as level as possible. Maintain proper distance between arms and body. If the wrist is too close or too far from the body, weak vibration occurs during exercise, and the action at this time cannot be counted. Vibration occurs at count, and counts once round trip. The higher the step, the greater the angle of motion of the wrist required for the count. Exercise records are recorded in the application when achieving the goal.
[Pressure Exercise] Press your arms and clench your fists to the count on your phone. The count on your phone has a cycle of approximately 5 seconds. 20 iterations to end and record motion.
Position miss has detected. Please hold the phone again by referring to the image on the screen. Or do exercis with correct position.
Finish if you press backbutton one more
